snippet.title: Illinois Venture Capital Association
snippet.description: * Illinois Venture Capital Association (clueweb12-1210wb-81-07220) http://ivca.mighty-site.com/pages/article/94.php?article_id=3271 ...O'Keefe & CompanyBlueCross BlueShield Venture PartnersCapX PartnersCeres Venture Fund, L.P.Certare Ventures, LLPChicago Growth PartnersChicago Public School Teachers' Pension & RetirementChrysalis VenturesCHS Capital LLCConversus Asset...was the catalyst for building this new venue? Steve Collens: Even before companies like Groupon, Chicago's digital startup ecosystem had taken shape and had begun to accelerate in the last three years. However, despite the level of activity  and relative to other cities with even a lot less activity  Chicago had very little cooperative working space. A number of people deeply involved in Chicagos tech community saw this need and came together to address it  including Matt Moog... [cached version]
